entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -26.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 9:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %

Dewpoint: -29.4°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
